name: asap
description: ASAP Reference Implementation - AI Site Agent Protocol

scripts.demo: start /B npm run demo:registry && timeout /t 2 >nul && start /B npm run demo:agent && timeout /t 2 >nul && npm run demo:consumer
scripts.demo:windows: start cmd /c "cd registry && node server.js" && timeout /t 2 >nul && start cmd /c "cd agent && node server.js" && timeout /t 3 >nul && cd ai-consumer && node index.js
